archimate:Requirement.name: PA.2.3.4: Independent testing services should be used to periodically verify the security of apps, which should be relevant to apps and the environment in which they operate, and consider factors such as the:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
